text: nwoke a ga-akpọrọ nwunye ya bịakwute onye nchụaja. Ọ ga-eweta onyinye iji ịbịaru nso nʼihi nwunye ya, nke bụ iko ụtụ ọka balị abụọ a na-awụkwasịghị mmanụ, maọbụ ụda na-esi isi ụtọ a gwakọrọ agwakọ, nʼihi na ọ bụ onyinye mkpụrụ ọka e sitere nʼobi jupụtara nʼekworo nye, onyinye ịkpọtụ uche nʼikpe ọmụma.
